General.Name: Fks Multi Agro Tbk
General.Description: PT FKS Multi Agro Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, supplies food and feed ingredients in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Trading and Distribution, Manufacturing, and Logistics. The company provides fermented and non-fermented soybean products, including soybean, groundnut, and rapeseed meals; corn and feed wheat; grain milling co-products, consisting of dried distiller's grains soluble, wheat bran pollard, and corn gluten meal and feed; and fish meals and fish oils, meat and bone meals, and poultry by-product meals for animal feeds. It also offers logistics services comprising port logistics, warehousing, transportation, and distribution and sales services, as well as bulk handling, charging and discharging, and storage services. In addition, the company is involved in the construction and management of industrial zones; provision of consulting and management services; stevedoring; and provision of loading and unloading services. Additionally, the company engages in the industrial operation, service sector, real estate, warehousing, art, entertainment and recreation, lodging and boarding, food and beverages, and rental and operating lease activities. The company was formerly known as PT Fishindo Kusuma Sejahtera. PT FKS Multi Agro Tbk was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT FKS Multi Agro Tbk is a subsidiary of PT FKS Corporindo Indonesia.
